Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Fuentepark in La Oliva (Corralejo), you'll be close to Playa Las Agujas and Corralejo Dunes Natural Park. This apartment is within the region of Corralejo Beach and Papagayo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 76 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Plasma televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and sofa beds, and housekeeping is provided on weekdays only.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff and luggage storage.


Pets allowed Check-out time is Noon
While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Apartamentos Fuentepark in La Oliva (Corralejo), you'll be close to Playa Las Agujas and Corralejo Dunes Natural Park. This apartment is within the region of Corralejo Beach and Papagayo Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Playa Las Agujas - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Corralejo Dunes Natural Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Corralejo Beach - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Papagayo Beach - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Cotillo Beach - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi
Marina Rubicon - 14.9 km / 9.3 mi
Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Playa Dorada - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Casa Museo Unamuno - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi
Fuerteventura Golf Course - 38.3 km / 23.8 mi
Betancuria Church - 38.9 km / 24.2 mi
Jurado Beach - 45.5 km / 28.3 mi
Ajuy Beach - 46.4 km / 28.8 mi
La Pared Beach - 67.2 km / 41.8 mi
Costa Calma Beach - 72.4 km / 45 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Fuentepark is Puerto del Rosario (FUE-Fuerteventura) - 31.5 km / 19.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
